mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_dev_task_scm ( DEV_TASK_ID, DEV_USER_ID, SCM_TYPE, COMMIT_NUMBER, COMMIT_MASSAGE, STATUS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{devTaskId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{devUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{scmType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{commitNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commitMassage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE DEV_USER_ID = VALUES(DEV_USER_ID), COMMIT_NUMBER = VALUES(COMMIT_NUMBER), COMMIT_MASSAGE = VALUES(COMMIT_MASSAGE), LAST_UPDATE_BY = VALUES(LAST_UPDATE_BY), LAST_UPDATE_DATE = VALUES(LAST_UPDATE_DATE)

SELECT tbts.ID, tdt.ID AS "DEV_TASK_ID", tdt.DEV_TASK_CODE, tdt.DEV_TASK_NAME, tbts.SCM_TYPE, tdt.CODE_REVIEW_STATUS, tsi.SYSTEM_NAME, tdt.DEV_USER_ID, tsi.CODE_REVIEW_USER_IDS FROM tbl_dev_task tdt LEFT JOIN tbl_dev_task_scm tbts ON tdt.ID = tbts.DEV_TASK_ID LEFT JOIN tbl_requirement_feature trf ON trf.ID = tdt.REQUIREMENT_FEATURE_ID LEFT JOIN tbl_system_info tsi ON trf.SYSTEM_ID = tsi.ID
1 = 1 AND tdt.STATUS = 1 AND (tdt.DEV_USER_ID = #{currentUserId} OR FIND_IN_SET(#{currentUserId},tsi.CODE_REVIEW_USER_IDS)) AND (tdt.CODE_REVIEW_STATUS IN (2,3) OR (tdt.CODE_REVIEW_STATUS = 1 AND tsi.CODE_REVIEW_STATUS = 1)) AND tdt.DEV_TASK_STATUS !=0
AND LOWER(tdt.DEV_TASK_CODE) LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',LOWER(#{tblDevTaskScm.devTaskCode}),'%'))
AND tdt.DEV_TASK_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{tblDevTaskScm.devTaskName},'%'))
AND FIND_IN_SET(tdt.DEV_USER_ID,#{tblDevTaskScm.devUserIds})
AND tdt.CODE_REVIEW_STATUS = #{tblDevTaskScm.codeReviewStatus}
ORDER BY tbts.LAST_UPDATE_DATE DESC

SELECT tdt.ID AS "DEV_TASK_ID", tdt.DEV_TASK_CODE, tdt.DEV_TASK_NAME, tdt.DEV_TASK_OVERVIEW, tdt.CODE_REVIEW_STATUS, tui.USER_NAME AS "DEV_USER_NAME" FROM tbl_dev_task tdt LEFT JOIN tbl_user_info tui ON tui.ID = tdt.DEV_USER_ID WHERE tdt.ID = #{devTaskId}
